trans-unit.source: Contains information about the reason that a workflow instance was suspended.
trans-unit.target: Contém informações sobre o motivo pelo qual uma instância de fluxo de trabalho foi suspensa.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs> is generated by the runtime tracking infrastructure when a workflow instance is suspended.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs> é gerado pelo tempo de execução de infra-estrutura de rastreamento quando uma instância de fluxo de trabalho é suspenso.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> associated with a workflow instance includes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> configured for a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>, then the workflow tracking infrastructure puts a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs> in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> that it sends to the Tracking service.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> associados com um fluxo de trabalho inclui instância um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> configurado para um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>, e o coloca de infraestrutura de controle de fluxo de trabalho um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs> na <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> que ele envia para o serviço de acompanhamento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs> is used only by the runtime tracking service to pass information in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs> é usado somente pelo tempo de execução do serviço de rastreamento para transmitir informações em um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>.

trans-unit.source: The data for a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowSuspended?displayProperty=nameWithType> event is passed in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowSuspendedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Os dados para um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowSuspended?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento é transmitido um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowSuspendedEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a method, named `WriteSuspendedEventArgs`, which captures a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra um método chamado `WriteSuspendedEventArgs`, que captura um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: The code writes information from the method's arguments to the console, including the value of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs.Error%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O código grava informações de argumentos do método no console, inclusive o valor da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs.Error%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the EventArgs Tracking SDK Sample from the Program.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte do EventArgs controle SDK exemplo do arquivo Program.cs.
Para obter mais informações, consulte [EventArgs controle exemplo](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/94818da2-c3c4-4a13-b47a-a0fb30dbbf1c).

trans-unit.source: Contains information about the reason that a workflow instance was suspended.
trans-unit.target: Contém informações sobre o motivo pelo qual uma instância de fluxo de trabalho foi suspensa.

trans-unit.source: This can come from the <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Suspend(System.String)" /> (string error) or the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity.Error" /> property that you set on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity" /> activity.
trans-unit.target: Isso pode vir do <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Suspend(System.String)" /> (erro de cadeia de caracteres) ou da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity.Error" /> definida na atividade <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: String value that contains the reason that a workflow instance was suspended.
trans-unit.target: Valor de cadeia de caracteres que contém o motivo que uma instância de fluxo de trabalho foi suspenso.
